name: setClassOfDevice(_:forTimeInterval:)
desc: Sets the current class of device value, for the specified amount of time. Note that the time interval *must* be set and valid. The range of acceptable values is 30-120 seconds. Anything above or below will be rounded up, or down, as appropriate.
declaration:
func setClassOfDevice(_ classOfDevice: BluetoothClassOfDevice, 
      forTimeInterval seconds: TimeInterval) -> IOReturn
